bug.author: asguradian
bug.summary: Object detection time increases as the image resolution increase.

comments.comment: Could you share your pipeline config files for Faster R-CNN, SSD, and Yolo? Can I also check what are the backbone networks you are using for each of them?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/asguradian>@asguradian</denchmark-link> Could you fill the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new?template=00-bug-performance-issue.md>template</denchmark-link> with your system details. Also, is it possible for you to check with latest Tensorflow 2.0. Thanks!
It has been 14 days with no activity and the awaiting response label was assigned. Is this still an issue?
Closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will open a new issue. Thanks!
